snippet: At the American Israel Public Affairs Committee Conference, Rick Santorum also said that if he was elected president, "we would find no gap between Israel and the United States because our interests are united."
abstract: At the American Israel Public Affairs Committee Conference, Rick Santorum also said that if he was elected president, "we would find no gap between Israel and the United States because our interests are united."

headline.main: Obama 'Has Turned His Back' on Israel, Santorum Says
